name: Publishizer, Inc.
description: Operator of a crowdfunding literary agency intended for authors and publishers. The company's platform connects authors with publishers and acquisitions editors through data and pre-order campaigns, enabling authors to pre-sell copies of their unpublished books and get pitching for the book to publishers and deal negotiation.
one_liner: Operator of a crowdfunding literary agency intended for authors and publishers. The company's platform connects authors with publishers and acquisitions editors through data and pre-order campaigns, enabling authors to pre-sell copies of their unpublished books and get pitching for the book to publishers and deal negotiation.
